name: musializer
readme_summary: Musializer is a tool for creating music visualizations and rendering high-quality videos. It supports multiple audio formats and features a custom build system called `nob`. The project also offers hot reloading capabilities for faster development and experimentation.
key_features: Support for multiple audio formats (wav, ogg, mp3, qoa, xm, mod, flac)
primary_use_case: Creating beautiful music visualizations and rendering high-quality videos of them.
cover_image_prompt: A conductor orchestrating a symphony of sound waves, transforming raw audio frequencies into a vibrant visual display on a large screen. The conductor's baton glows with digital particles, shaping the sound waves into colorful patterns and shapes. Small UI elements on the screen show real-time audio analysis and visualization parameters. The scene is set in a modern concert hall with dynamic lighting. The repository name, 'Musializer,' is subtly displayed on the conductor's music stand. The image should be in a digital painting style with clean lines and vibrant colors.

name: Chrome-OLED-Mode
description: Chrome OLED Mode adds a pitch black theme to websites, making them high contrast and easy to read at night.
readme_summary: The Chrome OLED Mode extension provides a pitch-black theme for websites, enhancing readability in low-light conditions. It utilizes React for dynamic rendering and offers features like site-specific themes, whitelist management, and automatic scheduling. The extension aims to provide a superior dark mode experience compared to alternatives.
key_features: High contrast for easy reading at night
primary_use_case: Applying a dark theme to websites for comfortable nighttime viewing, particularly beneficial for OLED screens.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artist in a dimly lit room, using a palette of pure black to paint over a vibrant, colorful website displayed on a large monitor. The artist's brush emits a dark, inky substance that transforms the bright website into a high-contrast, easy-to-read version. Small UI elements showing the extension's settings are subtly displayed on a nearby tablet. The scene is set in a modern studio with soft, ambient lighting. The image should be in digital painting style with clean lines and clear details, emphasizing the transformation from bright to dark.

name: hacker-laws
description: ðŸ§  Laws, Theories, Principles and Patterns for developers and technologists.
readme_summary: The hacker-laws repository serves as a curated collection of essential laws, theories, principles, and patterns for developers and technologists. It offers a comprehensive reference guide, covering a wide range of topics in software development and computer science, making it a valuable resource for understanding fundamental concepts and best practices.
key_features: Collection of laws, theories, principles, and patterns relevant to developers and technologists.
Comprehensive list covering various aspects of software development and computer science.
Organized into sections for Laws and Principles.
Links to external resources and further information.
primary_use_case: Providing a reference guide for developers and technologists on important laws, theories, principles, and patterns in the field.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a grand library filled with towering shelves, each labeled with subjects like 'Algorithms,' 'Networking,' and 'Software Design.' A wise scholar sits at a large oak table, illuminated by a soft, warm light. They are surrounded by stacks of open books, each representing a different law, principle, or theory. The scholar is carefully connecting these concepts with glowing threads, weaving them into a comprehensive tapestry of knowledge. Subtle digital interfaces float nearby, displaying code snippets and diagrams related to the laws. The repository name, 'Hacker Laws,' is subtly etched into the table. The image should be in a detailed digital painting style with a focus on clarity and visual harmony.

name: ink-kit
description: Onchain-focused SDK with ready-to-use templates, themes, and magical animated components âœ¨
readme_summary: Ink Kit is an SDK designed to streamline onchain application development. It provides developers with ready-to-use app layout templates, vibrant themes, and animated components, all designed to create polished and engaging user interfaces. The SDK aims to improve the developer experience by offering customizable and efficient tools for building onchain applications.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled artisan in a bright, modern workshop, meticulously crafting user interface components from raw digital materials. The artisan uses a magical loom that weaves together code snippets and vibrant color palettes to create buttons, layouts, and animated elements. These components are then carefully placed onto glowing screens, forming polished and engaging onchain applications. Subtle tech elements like floating code particles and the 'Ink Kit' logo subtly enhance the scene. The illustration is in a clean, 3D isometric style with a focus on clarity and vibrant colors, conveying the ease and delight of building onchain interfaces.

name: inbox-zero
description: AI personal assistant for email. Open source app to help you reach inbox zero fast.
readme_summary: Inbox Zero is an open-source AI email assistant and client designed to help users efficiently manage their inbox. It offers features like AI-powered email management, reply tracking, smart categorization, bulk unsubscribing, cold email blocking, and email analytics, all aimed at reducing time spent on email and achieving inbox zero.
key_features: AI Personal Assistant for email management
primary_use_case: Achieving and maintaining 'Inbox Zero' through AI-powered email management and organization.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a diligent librarian meticulously organizing a chaotic mountain of letters into neat, labeled folders using an AI-powered sorting system. The librarian, wearing glasses and a focused expression, stands amidst towering stacks of envelopes, some overflowing and disorganized. A holographic interface projects from their desk, displaying email categories and automated sorting rules. Small digital particles flow from the letters into the correct folders, guided by the AI. The repository's name, 'Inbox Zero,' is subtly displayed on the librarian's desk. The scene is set in a bright, airy library with a modern, minimalist design. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clear details and a calming color palette.

name: saber
description: The cross-platform open-source app built for handwriting
readme_summary: Saber is a cross-platform, open-source handwriting notes application designed for simplicity and intuitive use. It offers unique features such as note inversion for comfortable dark mode usage, a dual-password system for enhanced security, and a highlighting tool that avoids common rendering issues. Saber allows users to organize notes with nested folders and is available on various platforms, including Android, iOS, Linux, Windows, and macOS.
key_features: Cross-platform availability (Android, iOS, Linux, Windows, macOS)
primary_use_case: Taking handwritten notes across multiple platforms with a focus on features like dark mode optimization and secure storage.
cover_image_prompt: A calligrapher meticulously writing notes with a white ink brush on a large, dark chalkboard that glows softly. The chalkboard is framed by a modern, minimalist desk with a sleek laptop displaying the Saber app interface. The calligrapher's hand hovers over the board, and the notes are crisp and clear, even in the dim light. Subtle digital particles float around the chalkboard, forming equations and diagrams. The Saber logo is subtly etched into the corner of the chalkboard. The scene is set in a quiet, dimly lit study with a focus on the chalkboard. The image should be in a digital painting style with soft, diffused lighting and a dark color scheme.

name: dagger
description: An open-source runtime for composable workflows. Great for AI agents and CI/CD.
readme_summary: Dagger is an open-source runtime designed for composable workflows, making it ideal for AI agents and CI/CD pipelines. It offers features like containerized execution, a universal type system, automatic caching, and built-in observability. Dagger aims to provide a platform-agnostic solution for building and running complex applications with repeatability and modularity.
primary_use_case: Composable workflows, particularly for AI agents and CI/CD.
cover_image_prompt: A master architect overseeing a bustling construction site where diverse building blocks (representing code components in different languages) are seamlessly assembled into a magnificent, futuristic city (representing a complex workflow). The architect uses a holographic interface to orchestrate the construction, ensuring each block perfectly fits and functions within the larger structure. Small screens display real-time data and performance metrics. The scene is set in a bright, open environment with a clean, modern aesthetic. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details, conveying a sense of precision and efficiency.

name: gitdiagram
description: Free, simple, fast interactive diagrams for any GitHub repository
readme_summary: GitDiagram transforms GitHub repositories into interactive system design diagrams, enabling users to quickly visualize and understand the codebase structure. It offers features like instant visualization, interactive navigation, AI-powered diagram generation, and customization options, making it easier to explore and contribute to open-source projects.
key_features: Instant Visualization of GitHub repositories as system design diagrams
Interactive navigation to source files and directories
Fast diagram generation powered by AI
primary_use_case: Visualizing and understanding the structure of GitHub repositories.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled architect reviewing blueprints of a grand digital city, where each building represents a GitHub repository. The architect uses a special lens that instantly transforms the complex blueprints into interactive 3D models, revealing the structure and connections within each building. The city is filled with glowing data streams, and subtle UI elements float around the architect, displaying code snippets and file structures. The scene is set in a brightly lit, futuristic design studio with a clean, minimalist aesthetic. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details, conveying clarity and innovation.

name: whatsmeow
description: Go library for the WhatsApp web multidevice API
readme_summary: Whatsmeow is a Go library that provides comprehensive access to the WhatsApp web multidevice API. It allows Go developers to send and receive messages, manage groups, handle various event types, and manage app state, making it easier to integrate WhatsApp functionality into Go applications.
key_features: Sending messages to private chats and groups (text and media)
Managing groups and receiving group change events
Joining via invite messages, using and creating invite links
Sending and receiving delivery and read receipts
Reading and writing app state (contact list, chat pin/mute status, etc)
Sending and handling retry receipts if message decryption fails
primary_use_case: Enabling Go applications to interact with the WhatsApp web multidevice API.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent messenger bird, adorned with digital circuits, swiftly delivering encrypted messages between two towering castles representing different networks. The bird carries glowing packets of data, ensuring secure communication. One castle displays a WhatsApp logo subtly on its gate, while the other shows a generic web interface. Small UI elements float around the bird, displaying message status and encryption keys. The scene is set in a vibrant, stylized landscape with a clear sky. The composition is clean and focused with a bright color scheme. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and subtle digital enhancements.
